R

Random - Class in org.deidentifier.arx.masking
Provides quick access to an alternative random number generator used instead of the standard RNG Random, because of its mediocre statistical qualities.
Random() - Constructor for class org.deidentifier.arx.masking.Random
Creates a new Random object using the Well44497b RNG.
